Guard:
Oh, you must be new around here. If you don't mind a few pointers from an old hand...? Well, I couldn`t help but notice that when you used your weapon, there was no flash of light. I don`t mean to overstep my bounds if you know this already, but it makes things so much easier when you use Spiritshots. Here, let me give you a few. Do you know how to use them?
